page-sub-title: A free of charge, all-in-one platform towards a carbon neutral supply chain.
baseline-emissions-description: Comparing your status against other (anonymised) users to help your leadership set progressive ambitions.
estimate-your-foorprint-description: Understand your own emission footprint within a few minutes, based on the business data provided.
industry-comparison-description: Compare your emission reduction rate anonymously with industry peers and see how your rank for the year.
forecast-your-performance-description: Forecast your future emissions trendline, to understand where your company could focus its efforts next.
set-a-GHG-emission-target-description: Set an ambition that is in line with a 1.5-degree scenario applicable to your industry.
track-progress-description: Easily track your company's progress against decarbonisation ambition.
support-at-scale-description: Support your value chain at scale to prioritise your efforts for the greatest impact.
invite-across-your-value-chain-descripti: Invite your customers and suppliers to exchange emissions data and develop an in-depth understanding of your value chain’s emissions.
securely-exchange-emissions-data-descrip: Exchange data securely in a standardised format with customers and suppliers to gain insights of your supply chain emissions.
manage-your-requests-description: Manage your emissions sharing requests from your customers and suppliers on a single platform.
discover-alternatives-description: Explore low-carbon alternatives and estimate the potential impact on your future emissions.
explore-low-carbon-solutions-description: Discover cost-efficient, low-carbon alternatives for your company.
simulate-alternative-scenarios-descripti: Discover the impact on your future emissions by comparing existing options to available alternatives.
toolsToDecarbonise: The tools to decarbonise are yours – easy to use, free and secure
getDataDrivenEstimates: Get data-driven estimates of your carbon footprint, compare with industry peers and forecast future emissions trends. Implement lower GHG ambitions and track your decarbonisation progress.
collaborateWithYourCustomers: Collaborate with your customers and suppliers, share anonymised emissions data securely, and achieve shared decarbonisation ambitions.
exploreSolutions: Explore the potential impact of efficient, cleaner energy solutions on your business and supply chain.
collaborateWithOthers: Collaborate with others committed to decarbonisation, get inspired by insights, stories, discussions and more.
